description:
The COVID-19 vaccine pile-on in leading scientific journals continues apace. Dr Raphael Lataster summarises seven articles showing Covid vaccine harms that got past the censors.

The post Seven Articles in Top Journals Showing Covid Vaccine Harms That Got Past the Censors appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Seven Articles in Top Journals Showing Covid Vaccine Harms That Got Past the Censors

description:
Sir John Redwood – the veteran MP who headed Margaret Thatcher's policy unit in the 1980s and has opposed Net Zero and lockdown policies – has announced that he will stand down at the General Election.

The post John Redwood to Step Down as Record Number of Tory MPs Set to Quit appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: John Redwood to Step Down as Record Number of Tory MPs Set to Quit

description:
We’re in the middle of 2024, and the 'experts' still won’t give up their ridiculous defence of Covid mandates. But it's all just proof-by-assumption based on guesswork and biased data, says Ian Miller.

The post The ‘Experts’ Are Still Pushing Mandates appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The ‘Experts’ Are Still Pushing Mandates

description:
The state-subsidised electric car market has crashed in China and the country is trying to dump the vehicles on the West, but the same is happening here as well. For manufacturers it's going to be a blood bath.

The post The Electric Car Revolution is Coming Crashing Down appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Electric Car Revolution is Coming Crashing Down

description:
What is mass migration for, why does it keep happening and why will nobody stop It? Eugyppius looks at the main theories behind Europe's seemingly unclosable borders and the elites' odd attachment to the disastrous policy.

The post What is Mass Migration For, Why Does it Keep Happening, and Why Will Nobody Stop It? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: What is Mass Migration For, Why Does it Keep Happening, and Why Will Nobody Stop It?

description:
The Royal Society, the world's oldest scientific academy, has honoured Anthony Fauci, and in doing so confirmed its role as the guardian, not of empirical discovery, but politicised institutional Science.

The post Why has the Royal Society Honoured Anthony Fauci? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Why has the Royal Society Honoured Anthony Fauci?
